get.description: List all meetings in a project.

post.description:
Upload meeting audio file with connection error handling.

Handles:
- File read/write errors with retries
- Validation failures with cleanup
- Graceful error responses

get.description: Get processing status for a meeting (supports both UUID and legacy meeting_id).
List all previous meetings from storage folder.

post.description:
Perform semantic search across all meeting content.

Searches through:
- Meeting transcripts (chunked)
- Topics
- Decisions
- Action items
- Summaries

Returns results ranked by semantic similarity.
